Detailed Description

Base class for file filters.

Abstract class FileFilter is the base class for file filter functors. Concrete filters have to override method Complies(). If a function or method requires a file filter to be passed as argument but you are interested in all files then just pass the temporary object of an empty smart-pointer, i.e. FileFilterPtr(0).
